reviews.text: Reviews are automatically processed to detect inappropriate content like fake reviews and spam. We may take down reviews that are flagged in order to comply with Google policies or legal obligations.

"Could not be happier with the company and his service in particular." "Thank you for all the hard work keeping us swimming and relaxing year-round." "The whole build quality is questionable and customer service is terrible."

Purchased a new home with a Klapprodt pool remodel. As a new homeowner I wanted some assistance - called them multiple times and left messages, and also sent emails. Not one call back or email response. Maybe the name has reputation and they're too busy, but I'll never try to contact them again.

Klapprodt Pools built our pool and has serviced it for 3+ years. As new pool owners we had a lot to learn. Justin is our pool service tech has been there every step of the way.  We appreciate his advice, expertise and patience. Such a great guy! Our dogs look forward to his weekly visits too. Response from the owner a year ago Thank you so much for your business and sharing your experience!

Jayda has been servicing our pool for a little over 2 1/2 years. She is amazing at her job!  She makes sure your pool and spa is up and run all year long. She is at our home each week on time as schedule. If she’s going to be out she notifies me and lets me know who’s going to cover for her.  I appreciate all she does.. 😊😊 … Response from the owner a year ago Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and thank you for your continued business!
